channel.title: Pcal on Post It!
channel.description: Recent content in Pcal on Post It!

item.title: Imagemagick + pcal = calendar
item.description: This is the first version of the script I’ve created to make a calendar with photos using pcal and Imagemagik. It needs some folder and a “ps-type” font (here ChickenScratchAOE), but I think it’s quite easy to understand. I have created some of the files, such as “copertina”, before, using Gimp. #!/bin/bash # Parameters footnote = "..." # Create ps calendar files and convert them to pdf echo "Create pdf files of months.
